title: SPACIOUS ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT IN TRANQUIL GARDEN SETTING
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Inside our one and two bedroom apartments, you’ll find cottage style kitchens with dishwashers and generous storage.
Flexible, open plan living spaces, in-home washers and dryers, ceiling fans, large closets and private entrances are only a few of the other features unique to Birchwood.
Purrrfectly happy to welcome your fur babies!Indoor Cats Only Max (2) $500 Deposit & $50 per month pet rent.
In Unit, In Home Washer & Dryer
Guest Parking, Street Parking, Bicycle Parking
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven, Stainless Steel Appliances
Ceiling fans, Premium Unit Wall Warmers
Playground, Barbecue, Refreshing Swimming Pool, Outdoor Grilling Station, Ponderosa Park -tennis, basketball & more, Picnic Tables
Non-Smoking Property, Newly Redesigned Interiors, Custom Cabinets & Quartz Counters, Designer Wood Style Flooring, Walk-In Closets
